Planning.title: Planning
Planning.description: We start by analysing your existing website (if you have one) to determine its structure, then we work with you to tidy up and improve its sitemap. We ask you to provide any wording, images and other content you’d like to include

Planning.title: Design
Planning.description: Next we develop the wireframes into full colour, detailed mockups and share them with you again to collect and discuss your feedback. We also help you identify a primary call-to-action (CTA) that suits your business.

Planning.title: Development
Planning.description: We then move on to the build stage, where we bring the designs to life! We’re WordPress specialists and our main areas of technical expertise are HTML5, CSS, PHP, JavaScript and SVG animation.

webplaning1.webdetail1: We start by analysing your existing website (if you have one) to determine its structure, then we work with you to tidy up and improve its sitemap. We ask you to provide any wording, images and other content you’d like to include, and our expert copywriter helps to review and polish the drafts if needed. We use project management software called Basecamp which makes the process of collecting and sharing project assets very easy, with everything organised in one place.

webplaning2.webdetail2: Next we develop the wireframes into full colour, detailed mockups and share them with you again to collect and discuss your feedback. We also help you identify a primary call-to-action (CTA) that suits your business. Having a crystal-clear, appealing CTA significantly improves your conversion rate - turning your visitors into enquiries and sales. We’re experts in responsive design and you can rest assured that your website will adapt beautifully on all devices.

webplaning.webdetail3: We then move on to the build stage, where we bring the designs to life! We’re WordPress specialists and our main areas of technical expertise are HTML5, CSS, PHP, JavaScript and SVG animation. We also incorporate industry-leading tools which allow you to update and adapt your content on all pages of the website with user-friendly editors. You can preview everything on our development server before the launch, without affecting your existing website (if you have one).

blogpage.blogpagedetail: Next we develop the wireframes into full colour, detailed mockups and share them with you again to collect and discuss your feedback. We also help you identify a primary call-to-action (CTA) that suits your business. Having a crystal-clear, appealing CTA significantly improves your conversion rate - turning your visitors into enquiries and sales. We’re experts in responsive design and you can rest assured that your website will adapt beautifully on all devices.
